website_summaries.verdict: A modern matte style that looks stealthy yet functions for more than a metropolitan look.
pros: A subtle accessory designed with bold intentions
Customers love the charcoal matte lens that shows a hint of your eyes
Holds up well for active lifestyles, too
cons: Some question the quality of material and its ability to stand the test of time

customer_reviews.title: Real AX NOT Fake (Must Buy)
customer_reviews.text: These are the real Deal..!! I’m a hardcore AX shopper and only bought these because I looked on the website and they didn’t have any I liked! So of course I looked on amazon and Bam there they were!! Every other pair of Sunglasses I bought from AX came in a Clear or all black AX case but the AX case that came with these are so much better case and an AX cloth to clean them with is super fresh!! Came with the AX tags and all so I know there authentic!! So if your looking for real AX Sunglasses these are them!! (Must Buy) No regrets and am very happy with my Purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Papi Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Real AX
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of Armani glasses. These really surprised me. The temples are plastic and the glasses overall extremely lightweight. For some this may be preferred but to me they seem very cheaply constructed. I'll keep them but really not what I was expecting. Almost certainly overpriced.......more so than most sunglasses are.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Cox

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight polarized used sunglasses - no certificate of authenticity
customer_reviews.text: These pair of polarized sunglasses are so great very nice fit light weight stylish well made and the case that came with it very nice too. I wish these pair of glasses were new. I paid for used pair of glasses which in my opinion it is over priced. No certifícate of authenticity which on the previous customer showing their certificate I don’t even think these pair of glasses are real anymore Amazon should contact these people not sell used products not telling customers that they are authentic as they have it on their description.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto L. Zanabria

customer_reviews.title: not worth even half their price
customer_reviews.text: Dude,be aware that you are paying 50+ just for the "AX" brand logo on the side. They look and feel really chinese cheap, they weight like ... nothing, this is not a good thing in quality shades, the arms are plastic, so are the lens, won't even ask if they are scratch resistant. They design looks better in pictures, I got very disappointed when I had it in my hands, I used them only a couple of times, I hate them. I will go guess next time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex00

customer_reviews.title: Great, authentic AX sunglasses for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Got these from Amazon directly. Authentic. Has a slip included with the number and the website you can check them. They come in a hard case that closes nicely, but it takes a little to figure out exactly how to put the sunglasses in the case so it can close. Also has a small microfiber cleaning cloth. Highly recommended! They look great!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved these! He’s always looking for “bigger” sunglasses that fit well & doesn’t look small on his face. These were perfect, didn’t appear small or big. Fits well. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernBrewReviews

customer_reviews.title: My husband love them!
customer_reviews.text: If you think they’re fake because they are light weight you’re wrong. My husband loves Armani exchange and I bought this for his birthday for a better price than sunglasshut! He had the black ones before and they look the same! Very good quality! And look very nice 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Monix

customer_reviews.title: 40$ Less than retail
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for around $100 at a retail store and they got scratched. I went here to just and see if they were available and I was surprised to see the same pair for so much less. Exact same glasses, with a nice case. For the money, these compare to much more expensive glasses I have owned and they still feel high end.
customer_reviews.author: Dmart375

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: They look so much better in person. Got these as a birthday gift for my boyfriend. I love the case as well.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer jones

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair at kohl’s first for $90 then found these on amazon for half the price, so I bought two pair. Polarized and regular. Absolutely love them. Might even buy another for backups. Polarized lenses are a tase lighter in color, that is fine with me. Great lens Clarity and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Derek W.

customer_reviews.title: This product has been approved!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sun glasses, quality is as expected, and I believe it’s an authentic product. It came with a sunglass pocket and an authenticity certificate.

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance and I'm glad

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These feel very sturdy to me. I wear a LOT of sunglasses, but this is the first premium pair I've ever owned. Honestly they look wonderful, but there are very similar glasses you can get for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Don't drink and drive
customer_reviews.text: Saw these in a store and had to have them. Just wasn't wanting to pay retail price. These glasses are the best if you love a tactical looking aviator

customer_reviews.title: The best part of these glasses is the rag and case ...
customer_reviews.text: I would rate these less if i could but its not possible. The best part of these glasses is the rag and case that come with them. Mine the left lens fell out riding over a bump in the car. thought i put it in correct but then went on a trip to Thailand and it happened again when on a motor bike. I couldn't retrieve the lens so i threw them out. Very poorly made is all. Could get a better set next to nothing in Thailand!

product_meta.title: AX Armani Exchange Men's Ax2012s Rectangular Metal Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Young and contemporary, A|X Armani Exchange sunglasses redefine the essentials of Armani style through a sophisticated use of urban style. These Armani Exchange AX2012S sunglasses for men feature a rectangular metal frame with a double bridge, tapered temples embellished with the A|X logo and solid, gradient or polarized gradient lenses. The lenses on the AX2012S sunglasses are scratch resistance and are coated with 100% UV protection to protect your eyes from harmful UV rays. Each pair of A|X Armani Exchange sunglasses come with a sunglass case and cleaning cloth to clean, protect and store your sunglasses. A|X Armani Exchange sunglasses sold by authorized sellers, like Amazon.com, are eligible for all manufacturer warranties and guarantees and come with a certificate of authenticity.
feature_bullets: AX2012S RECTANGULAR METAL SUNGLASSES: These A|X ARMANI EXCHANGE AX2012S sunglasses feature a rectangular, black metal frame with a double bridge, tapered temples embellished with the A|X logo and grey lenses.
100% UV PROTECTION: To protect your eyes from harmful UV rays, these sunglasses include lenses that are coated with 100% UV protection.

CERTIFICATE OF AUTHENTICITY & WARRANTY INCLUDED: Armani Exchange sunglasses sold by authorized sellers, like Amazon.com, are eligible for all manufacturer warranties and guarantees and come with a certificate of authenticity.
CASE & LENS CLOTH INCLUDED: Each pair of Armani Exchange sunglasses come with a sunglass case and lens cloth to clean and protect them from scratches and damage.
SHOP THE ARMANI EXCHANGE BRAND SHOP: Click on the Armani AX logo above to shop the entire Armani Exchange assortment.
